cfcebb8f9c4627691f785713d489e5eb322ebc4a: ALTER TABLE ${schema}.expense ADD COLUMN name VARCHAR(100) NULL
f68c9b65263d4c3a5c829aab13c2238e1e88dfea: ALTER TABLE ${schema}.expense ADD COLUMN unique_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
28d8aae52dc6e9cfef89733fe576c526a7fec3e8: CREATE TABLE ${schema}.jobs (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'created', metadata JSONB NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE ${schema}.jobs_user_mapping (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, job_id INTEGER NOT NULL, user_id INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_job FOREIGN KEY (job_id) REFERENCES ${schema}.jobs(id), CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES ${schema}.user(id));
b305af0e7f6a428f6259ea76f26131946ce02842: CREATE TABLE ${schema}.categories (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, created_by INTEGER NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_created_by FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES ${schema}.user(id));

CREATE TABLE ${schema}.subcategories (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, created_by INTEGER NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_created_by FOREIGN KEY (created_by) REFERENCES ${schema}.user(id));

CREATE TABLE ${schema}.category_subcategory_mapping (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, category_id INTEGER NOT NULL, subcategory_id INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_category FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES ${schema}.categories(id), CONSTRAINT fk_subcategory FOREIGN KEY (subcategory_id) REFERENCES ${schema}.subcategories(id));

CREATE TABLE ${schema}.subcategory_rules (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, subcategory_id INTEGER NOT NULL, rule JSONB NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_subcategory FOREIGN KEY (subcategory_id) REFERENCES ${schema}.subcategories(id));
